exampleSentence: [Literature] Submit a manuscript to publishers. | [Writing] Edit the manuscript carefully. | [History] Discover an ancient manuscript.

interpret: A story or account of events, real or imagined.
exampleSentence: [Literature] Write a compelling narrative. | [Story] The narrative was engaging. | [Book] Analyze the narrative structure.

interpret: A picture created by applying paint to a surface.
exampleSentence: [Art] Admire a famous painting. | [Creativity] Try painting a landscape. | [Gallery] Display new paintings.

interpret: A three-dimensional artwork created by carving or molding.
exampleSentence: [Art] View a marble sculpture. | [Creativity] Create a clay sculpture. | [Museum] Sculptures attract visitors.

interpret: A strong cloth used as a surface for painting.
exampleSentence: [Art] Paint on a canvas. | [Creativity] Buy a large canvas. | [Gallery] Display art on canvas.

interpret: A public display of art or other items.
exampleSentence: [Art] Visit an art exhibition. | [Gallery] Host a sculpture exhibition. | [Culture] Exhibitions showcase talent.

interpret: A painting or view of natural scenery.
exampleSentence: [Art] Paint a mountain landscape. | [Nature] Admire the natural landscape. | [Gallery] Display landscape art.

interpret: A long musical composition for an orchestra.
exampleSentence: [Music] Listen to a symphony. | [Performance] The orchestra played a symphony. | [Art] Compose a new symphony.

interpret: An act of presenting a play, concert, or dance.
exampleSentence: [Dance] Watch a live performance. | [Art] Prepare for a performance. | [Culture] Performances attract audiences.

interpret: Clothing worn for a performance or event.
exampleSentence: [Performance] Wear a dance costume. | [Theater] Design new costumes. | [Art] Costumes enhance the show.

interpret: The people watching or listening to a performance.
exampleSentence: [Performance] Entertain the audience. | [Theater] The audience clapped loudly. | [Art] Audiences enjoy shows.

interpret: The art or industry of making films.
exampleSentence: [Art] Watch a film in the cinema. | [Culture] Cinema tells stories. | [Entertainment] Visit the local cinema.

interpret: A person who creates clothing or other products.
exampleSentence: [Fashion] Meet a famous designer. | [Art] Designers create trends. | [Industry] Work as a fashion designer.

interpret: A general direction in which fashion or style develops.
exampleSentence: [Fashion] Follow the latest trend. | [Culture] Trends influence style. | [Industry] Trends change seasonally.

interpret: Programs used to operate computers or devices.
exampleSentence: [Technology] Install new software. | [Computer] Use editing software. | [Industry] Software drives innovation.

interpret: An organized collection of data, typically stored electronically.
exampleSentence: [Technology] Manage a database. | [Software] Store data in a database. | [Industry] Databases organize information.

interpret: A set of instructions to solve a problem.
exampleSentence: [Technology] Design an efficient algorithm. | [Programming] Algorithms solve problems. | [Science] Study algorithm performance.

interpret: The use of machines to perform tasks automatically.
exampleSentence: [Technology] Automation improves efficiency. | [Industry] Use automation in factories. | [Innovation] Automation saves time.

interpret: Online storage and computing services.
exampleSentence: [Technology] Store files in the cloud. | [Innovation] Cloud computing saves space. | [Industry] Use cloud services.

interpret: A place or system for buying and selling goods.
exampleSentence: [Business] Analyze the stock market. | [Economy] Enter a new market. | [Commerce] Markets drive trade.

interpret: A person who starts and runs a business.
exampleSentence: [Business] Become an entrepreneur. | [Economy] Entrepreneurs create jobs. | [Innovation] Support young entrepreneurs.

interpret: A plan to achieve a long-term goal.
exampleSentence: [Business] Develop a business strategy. | [Economy] Follow a marketing strategy. | [Planning] Strategies ensure success.
